content: materials and gauge gauge in double_crochet 11 stitches and 7 row = 4 inches yarn red heart super saver less than a skein each red white and green tones tapestry needle for sewing h hook or hook needed for your yarn choice to obtain gauge twas the night before christmas elf hat-1 notes and hacks the stitch count is found at the end of each round inside a parenthesis if there is no stitch count then the stitch count for that round is the same as the previous round all images and tutorials are found at the end of the pattern the numbers on the photos correspond to the row or round in which they appear i have included many photos to help guide you if you get confused but you may find you do not need them feel free to omit the last few pages or pick and choose which pages you want to print when printing to conserve ink if this is the case i d love to see your projects feel free to tag me #dragonbirdcreations i always chain 2 for my start of a row to count as a double_crochet or half_double_crochet if however you prefer chain 3 feel free to substitute that for the chain 2 the hat will fit a head size 21 5-23 5 which fits most adults feel free to experiment to change up your initial stitch count-just keep it an even number so you can have even amounts of bpdc/fpdc for the beginning band section stitches and abbreviations bl-back loop through two loops yo insert hook in the next stitch pull up a loop yo pull through two loops yo pull through remaining loops blo-back loop only bp-back post standing begin with the stitch that is fp-front post mentioned you will hold the slip_stitch that is on your hook steady with one finger as you make the stitch for a video demonstration use this rs-right side link https //youtu be/lkfac8rkj9u yo-yarn over hook st-stitch fo-finish off sl-slip chain-chain dcdec-double_crochet decrease yo insert hook in stitch indicated pull up a loop yo pull twas the night before christmas elf hat-2 hat 1 with green loosely chain 60 and join with slip_stitch to first chain being careful to not twist loop chain 2 counts as double_crochet and double_crochet in remaining 59 double_crochet around join with slip_stitch to first
